historical_summary: Xavier started his journey with skepticism about college life and coding, often feeling overwhelmed by coursework. His interest in blockchain and crypto was sparked by overheard conversations and further fueled by his own research into trading and finance. He secured an internship through a family connection, showing an early interest in quant finance and blockchain technologies.
upcoming: AI Pair Programming: Xavier plans to leverage AI tools to enhance his coding efficiency, particularly focusing on smart contract development. He aims to contribute to open-source blockchain projects, using AI to debug and optimize code.

Smart Contracts: He will enroll in a specialized course on smart contracts to deepen his understanding and practical skills, aiming to develop a small project or tool that uses smart contracts for real-world applications.

historical_summary: Xavier has expressed feelings of loneliness and struggles with social interactions, particularly in the college environment. He's exploring dating, with recent positive experiences that he hopes to build upon.
upcoming: He plans to continue dating, using insights from recent successful interactions to foster deeper connections.
Xavier aims to explore more of New York City's cultural scene, attending art exhibits and possibly integrating his interest in technology by visiting tech-themed events or exhibitions.

historical_summary: Regular communication with his family, discussing his life changes and tech interests. There's a supportive relationship, especially evident when he decided to take a leave of absence from college.
upcoming: Xavier will keep his family updated on his professional journey, particularly his progress in smart contract development and any new projects he undertakes.
He plans to organize a family visit to New York to share his experiences and perhaps discuss his future career plans, leveraging his recent crypto successes.

historical_summary: Initially felt out of place at NYU, but gradually made connections through shared interests in technology and finance. His social circle expanded through networking events and casual interactions.
upcoming: Xavier intends to join or start a blockchain and crypto meetup group, leveraging his newfound confidence in the space to network with like-minded individuals.
He will also attend and possibly speak at local tech events, enhancing his visibility and connections within the blockchain community.

historical_summary: Xavier has been contemplating the role of technology in his life and society, often questioning the paths available and the potential of new technologies. His interest in psychedelics hints at a search for deeper understanding or meaning.
upcoming: Maturing Technologies: He will explore the implications of blockchain beyond finance, considering its potential in art, identity verification, and governance. This might lead to a reflective piece or blog post on how blockchain could revolutionize societal structures.
He plans to engage in discussions or write about the ethical considerations of AI pair programming, particularly how it impacts job markets and creative processes in coding.
